Package Description
fr.utt.lo02.tdvp.model.layout
Provides model classes for the differents layouts for the game board.

    Methods in fr.utt.lo02.tdvp.model.layout with parameters of type Location
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card Layout.getCardAt​(Location location)
    Returns the card placed at the specified (x, y) coordinates of a given Location A null value will be returned if the location doesn't exists or if no card is placed at these coordinates.

    Set a Card at a specified Location
